title: I'm So Happy Scare Tactics Is Back Just In Time For Halloween
description: 20 years ago, SyFy (which was still known as the SciFi Channel) premiered a hidden camera prank show called Scare Tactics. The premise behind the series was placing real people into terrifying, often paranormal or bizarre situations, and then watching them react. I loved the show when I was younger. And I’m so happy…Read more...

description: A massive leak of data from Pokémon developer Game Freak, widely distributed online as the result of a hack of the company, has revealed new details about the past and future of franchise games, animated series, and live-action projects. That includes unconfirmed intel about the next generation of Pokémon — aka Gen 10 — and a new […]

title: Helldivers 2 developer rolls out even more buffs in second big patch
description: Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead Game Studios has been continually tweaking the horde shooter since launch, and some of those changes have been better received than others. After many nerfs to popular weapons and stratagems made the community unhappy, Arrowhead reversed course with a 60-day plan. The first patch released in September to great acclaim, and […]
author: Cass Marshall

title: No plans for a Space Marine 2 PvPvE mode - "it sounds great on paper", but "it's very annoying" in practice
description: In the grim darkness of the far future, you will not have to worry about getting preyed upon by rival Space Marine chapters whilst duffing up the Tyranids, for there are no plans to add a PvPvE mode to Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. That's according to game director Dmitry Grigorenko, who observes that enjoyable PvPvE is the "holy grail" of game design, much-sought and seldom claimed. Balancing shooters in which players fight both each other and the bots is tricky, especially in a game as prone to dousing the screen in giblets as Space Marine 2. Read more
author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell

title: Letalis is Pokémon for GameBoy except you're battling with Roman gladiators
description: The allure of the sea-green GameBoy screen is difficult to resist. Picking up from where Pokémon left off two decades ago, Letalis is a bleepy-bloopy retro RPG about wandering from town to town and doing battle with dodgy local leaders to prove your worth. But you won't be doing the fighting yourself, God no. Leave that to the squad of Roman gladiators hiding in your back pocket. Read more
author: Brendan Caldwell

title: Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 2!
description: Happy Tuesday! For day 2 of the Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, I’m wearing an oldie but goodie — NARS Dragon Girl, a cool-toned red lip crayon. I’ve got the old school version in the black packaging, RIP. NARS reformulated their lip crayon line into what they call the Powermattes, and you know, sometimes I wonder why brands don’t just leave well enough alone. Anywho, I like the color of the older version, which I think is slightly cooler and more magenta. Two things before I head out! One, for some reason I always want to call this lipstick “Dragon Roll,” like it’s a type of sushi, hahaha! The second is that if I look a little dazed and confused in these pictures (which I took right before heading into the office), it’s because my co-worker caught me taking selfies, and I was kinda embarrassed to be having a full-on photo shoot in my car so early in the morning. 🙂 What lip color are you wearing today? Have a most excellent Tuesday, my friend! Your[Continue reading...] The post Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 2! appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 1!
description: I’m challenging myself to wear lip color everyday this week! I got started a little early yesterday with a MAC liquid lipstick called A Little Tamed. Do you want to join me? I’m setting the bar pretty low and giving myself the option of wearing the same color a few times, but I’m hoping that I’ll feel motivated to do a new color every day. Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen The post Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 1! appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.

title: Oppenheimer's New 4K Limited-Edition Steelbook Is Only $30 And Exclusive To Walmart
description: Director Christopher Nolan's 2024 Best Picture winner, Oppenheimer, has been available on 4K Blu-ray for almost a year--but if you missed out the steelbook case at Best Buy last year, you have another opportunity to get a similar one at Walmart. A new Oppenheimer 4K Steelbook Edition releases November 19.. Preorders are available now for $30, which is cheaper than the now out-of-print Best Buy steelbook ($38) and Walmart's Icon Edition ($35, also out of print). Preorder at Walmart The main selling point of this edition of Oppenheimer is its collectible steelbook case, making for a great-looking addition to your physical media shelf. This edition includes the movie in 4K Ultra HD, as well as a standard Blu-ray version, and a code for a digital copy, as well.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Sony's Until Dawn Movie Lands A 2025 Release Date
description: At the beginning of 2024, Sony Pictures announced that an Until Dawn feature film was in the works based on the 2015 interactive game from Supermassive Games and Sony. Now, Until Dawn has finished filming and the movie will head to the big screen just a few months ahead of the game's tenth anniversary in 2025.Sony has set an April 25, 2025 release date for Until Dawn, which was directed by David F. Sandberg, a filmmaker who most recently helmed the two Shazam! movies for DC and Warner Bros. Pictures. Former G4 personality Blair Butler wrote a previous draft of the script, but the final version was written by Gary Dauberman. who also produced the film with Sandberg.The original game featured Oscar-winner Rami Malek, Hayden Panettiere, and Brett Dalton as part of a group of friends who reunite in a remote mountain resort one year after two of their friends disappeared under murky circumstances. The group soon finds themselves facing a horrific threat in the wintry woods.Continue Reading at GameSpot
